member.name: M:CMS.Localization.CultureInfo.GetDefaultDataWhereCondition(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Gets the where condition to filter out the default installation data
member.param: Indicates whether where condition should contain further dependency conditions.
Indicates whether only objects with null in their site ID column should be included.
Objects with display names and code names starting with these expressions are filtered out.

member.summary: Returns the default object installation data
member.remarks: Only en-US culture is marked as UI culture for the default data.
member.param: Objects with display names and code names starting with these expressions are filtered out.

summary.para: Default path prefix to be used when resolving path to CMSResources folder. Gets unless explicitly set. Existing resource file managers must be cleared upon set by calling for the change to take effect on them.
This API supports the framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: M:CMS.Localization.LocalizationHelper.GetResourceFilePaths(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the names of resource files (including their paths) for the specified culture.
member.param: The culture name in the format languagecode2-country/regioncode2, or an empty string for the default localization.
The path to the folder with resource files (optional).
member.returns: A semi-colon separated list of the full names of resource files (including their paths) for the specified culture, or NULL if no resource files are found.

member.name: M:CMS.Localization.LocalizationHelper.GetDefaultResourcesFilePaths(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of the names of default resource files (including their paths) for the specified culture.
member.param: The path to the folder with resource files.
The culture name in the format languagecode2-country/regioncode2, or an empty string for the default localization.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of the full names of default resource files (including their paths) for the specified culture
